mapper.select: select a.*,u.name username,u1.name opinionUser1,u2.name opinionUser2,f.name floorname,r.name roomname,r.scale ,r.floor from orders a left join user u on u.id = a.user_id left join room r on r.id = a.room_id left join classes c on c.id = u.classes_id left join user u1 on u1.id = c.user_id and u.type = "student" left join building f on f.id = r.floor_id left join user u2 on u2.id = f.user_id
